H0.text: 190 degrees Centigrade on an electric cooker, is equivalent to 'gas mark' what. 3

H1.text: 190 degrees Centigrade on an electric cooker, is equivalent to 'gas mark' what. 7

H2.text: 190 degrees Centigrade on an electric cooker, is equivalent to 'gas mark' what. 9

H3.text: 190 degrees Centigrade on an electric cooker, is equivalent to 'gas mark' what. 5(FIVE)

A4.text: Gas mark 1 is 275 degrees Fahrenheit (135 degrees Celsius). Oven temperatures increase by 25 °F (14 °C) for each gas mark step.

A5.text: For temperatures above 135 °C (gas mark 1), to convert gas mark to degrees Celsius (C), multiply the gas mark number (G) by 14, then add 121: (G × 14)+121=C.
